title: Evidence
description: An artifact that provides verifiable proof of an action or event for non-repudiation and audit purposes. Anchored to NIST SP 800-53 AU-10 (Non-repudiation), evidence types range from cryptographic signatures to plain audit log entries, with strength characterizing the assurance level per NIST SP 800-63-3.

type.description: Category of evidence artifact, per NIST AU-10 (Non-repudiation).

strength.description: Assurance strength of the evidence, per NIST SP 800-63-3 assurance levels.

source.description: Origin or location of this evidence artifact, such as a system identifier, log stream name, or storage URI.
